I think it should be a life-changing prize and just to be clear, this isn't a dressed-up$ 5 million. This is a guaranteed$ 5 million payable to the winner. The recording, marketing and video costs are completely separate to that. It will be paid over five years at$ 1 million a year. Nokia's history of innovation in the hardware space, global hardware scale, strong history of intellectual property creation and navigation assets are second to none.
